Total_Links:
Financial Highlights (FY25): Revenue from operations reached ₹18,870 crore, up 14.1% YoY. EBITDA stood at ₹4,712 crore (up 8.9%), and Profit After Tax was ₹4,734 crore (up 18.3%).

Royal Enfield Sales: The company achieved its highest-ever quarterly sales with 280,801 motorcycles in Q4 FY25, a 23.2% YoY growth. Royal Enfield also crossed one million annual sales for the first time, with total volumes at 1,002,893 units (up 10.0% YoY).

Dividend: The Board of Directors recommended a final dividend of ₹70 per share for FY25, a 34% increase over the previous year.

VE Commercial Vehicles (VECV): VECV reported revenue from operations of ₹23,548 crore (up 7.7% YoY) and sold 90,000 units in FY25, a 5.4% growth over FY24.

Motorcycle Sales: Eicher Motors reported a 26% YoY increase in motorcycle sales, totaling 89,429 units.

VECV Sales: VE Commercial Vehicles recorded a 7.3% rise in total commercial vehicle sales, reaching 7,402 units.

On May 1, 2025, Eicher Motors saw no specific announcements. However, recent updates highlight a strong financial performance in FY25, including crossing one million annual motorcycle sales.

Stock Performance (July 7, 2025) : Eicher Motors shares closed at ₹5,672.25. The 52-week high was ₹5,907.85 (April 22, 2025), and the 52-week low was ₹4,500 (October 8, 2024).
